General.Name: Rajshree Polypack Limited
General.Description: Rajshree Polypack Limited manufactures and sells rigid plastic sheets and thermoformed packaging products in India and internationally. It offers sealing and lidding laminates; sheets of PP/APET/GPET/HIPS for form-fill-seal (FFS) applications; and plastic rigid sheets for electronic, textile, stationary, industrial, and pharmaceutical packaging, as well as displays and FFS applications. The company also provides rigid packaging products for yoghurt; ice cream, butter, and spreads; juice and beverages packing; and bakery, chocolate, and confectionery, as well as online food delivery. In addition, it offers barrier packaging products for ethnic sweets, snacks, pet food, ready-to-eat meal, dry fruits, fruits and vegetable, baby food, dairy products, and tube laminates, as well as polypropylene sheets for thermoforming, food and pharmaceutical packaging, box making, and stationary. Further, the company provides packaging solutions for beverages, juice, and water; MAP and retort/semi-retort packaging; food service; frozen food; fruits, vegetable, and salad; and confectionery, as well as injection moulded containers, and soufflé/portion cups. It serves dairy, beverages, food, FMCG, QSR, retail, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and electronics industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Thane, India.
General.Address: Lodha Supremus, Building No. 1, Thane, India, 400604
